mapper.sql:
select sdad.id, sdad.bill_date, sdad.bill_batch_no, sdad.order_num, sdad.unit_num, sdad.pay_amount, mc.mall_name, si.shop_name from sm_divide_account_detail sdad LEFT JOIN ry_rmmm.shop_info si on si.id = sdad.shop_id LEFT JOIN ry_rmmm.mall_cooperate mc ON mc.id = sdad.mall_id where sdad.is_delete = 0
and sdad.divide_account_id = #{divideAccountId}
mapper.insert:
insert into sm_divide_account_detail ( mall_id, shop_id, bill_date, bill_batch_no, divide_account_id, order_num, unit_num, pay_amount, create_by, update_by, create_at, update_at ) values
( #{sm.mallId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sm.shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sm.billDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sm.billBatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm.divideAccountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sm.orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sm.unitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sm.payAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sm.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now() )
